name: Get the Fog Out (UnderCtrlGames, david-sam22, Nikkita Racquel, emily97, TheAioliGuy, MJGermon, Aravien, Manticore, liamcgd, huf0001)
name_original: Get the Fog Out (UnderCtrlGames, david-sam22, Nikkita Racquel, emily97, TheAioliGuy, MJGermon, Aravien, Manticore, liamcgd, huf0001)
description:
You’ve crashed landed on a hostile alien planet. Your only goal: GET THE FOG OUT.

In Get the Fog Out, you, the player, ran into some misfortune on your space travels and crash landed on a desolate planet covered in a thick, ominous fog. With help from Nexy, your ship’s emergency Nexus Drone, you fight your way through the fog, soon discovering that it isn’t as docile as you first thought.

Get the Fog Out is an isometric game that takes inspiration from real-time strategy games and base builders. It was made in Unity by Under Ctrl, a team of third-year games students from Swinburne University. The game has been showcased at Swinburne Open Day 2019 and PAX Australia 2019 alongside other games produced by Swinburne games students.

Website: http://underctrlgames.xyz/

Presskit: http://underctrlgames.xyz/presskit/index.php

  • Sam Huffer: Fog/Tutorial/Dialogue Programmer

  • David Sam: Programmer

Our thanks to our lecturer Andrew Trevillian and our tutors Joe Park, Laura Voss and Tom Baker for their professional input and feedback.
